adept.name: Adept
adept.desc: (Speed)% for the user to do two consecutive strikes.

aether.name: Aether
aether.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to do two strikes: One with a Sol effect, and the other ignores the enemy's defense.

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: (Skill/2)% chance for the user to strike 5 times in a row. Each strike cannot crit and can miss.

aurora.name: Aurora
aurora.desc: Deals half of the damage taken by the user back to the foe.

bane.name: Bane
bane.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to reduce foe's HP to 1.

beastfoe.name: Beastfoe
beastfoe.desc: All attacks do effective damage against beast laguz.

birdfoe.name: Birdfoe
birdfoe.desc: All attacks do effective damage against bird laguz.

blessing.name: Blessing
blessing.desc: Allies adjacent to the user restore HP (equal to userâ€™s Magic) at the beginning of the turn.

bloodtide.name: Blood Tide
bloodtide.desc: Increases adjacent allies strength and skill by 5.

blossom.name: Blossom
blossom.desc: User gains less experience (1/2 of the normal amount) and if a stat fails to increase, it rolls again for a second chance.

boon.name: Boon
boon.desc: Cures the status effects of all allies adjecent to the user at the start of the turn.

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.desc: (Speed)% chance to block all damage done to the user.

canto.name: Canto
canto.desc: Allows the user to move again and use up any leftover movement distance.

colossus.name: Colossus
colossus.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to multiply user's strength by 3.

corona.name: Corona
corona.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to ignore foe's resistance and halves their hit rate for one turn.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to reduce enemy's weapon durability by (user's level).

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: (Skill)% chance to return half damage to the enemy when damaged.

daunt.name: Daunt
daunt.desc: Inflicts -5 accuracy/crit to enemies within 3 tiles.

deadeye.name: Deadeye
deadeye.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to multiply damage by 3 and inflict sleep on foe.

disarm.name: Disarm
disarm.desc: (Skill/2)% to unequip the foe's equipped weapon.

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.desc: Doubles the user's weapon experience gain.

dragonfoe.name: Dragonfoe
dragonfoe.desc: All attacks do effective damage against dragon laguz.

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to mutiply user's strength by 5 and ignore foe's defense.

flare.name: Flare
flare.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to ignore foe's resistance and restore HP based on damage dealt to the enemy.

flourish.name: Flourish
flourish.desc: Command: Reduces user's attack by half.

formshift.name: Formshift
formshift.desc: User's transform gauge is always full.

reference.Class:
Wolf Queen
Lion King
Raven King
Hawk King
Dragon Prince

fortune.name: Fortune
fortune.desc: Negates the foe's ability to inflict critical hits against the user.

galdrar.name: Galdrar
galdrar.desc:
Command: Effect changes depending on selected chant, new ones can be unlocked via level:
**Lv.1 / Vigor:** Allows adjacent allies to move again.
**Lv. 15 / Bliss:** Raises the biorhythm of adjacent allies to its highest point.
**Lv. 15 / Sorrow:**: Lowers the biorhythm of adjacent enemies to its lowest point.
**Lv. 30 / Valor:** Fills fully the transform gauge of adjacent laguz allies.
**Lv. 40 / Recovery:** Restores the HP and cures the status conditions of nearby allies.
Leanne's galdrar only affects units behind and in the front of her
and Reyson while unstransformed only affects one adjacent unit.

gamble.name: Gamble
gamble.desc: Command: User's accuracy is halved and the critical rate is doubled for one round of combat.

glare.name: Glare
glare.desc: Command: ([Skill/2] + [Biorhythm])% chance to inflict petrify on the target on hit.

guard.name: Guard
guard.desc: If user has a support with an adjacent unit, and that ally is attacked, (??, based on suport level?)% chance for the user to take the hit instead.

howl.name: Howl
howl.desc: (Strength)% chance to inflict paralysis on foe if they initiate combat at 2 range and damages the user.

imbue.name: Imbue
imbue.desc: At the start of each turn, user restores HP as the same amount as user's magic. Can only be equipped by non-magic users (excl. White Dragon)

reference.Class:
Red Dragon
White Dragon
Black Dragon

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to kill the enemy. Cannot be used against bosses.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to mutiply user's strength by 3 and ignore foe's defense.

maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
maelstrom.desc: (Skill)% chance to deal (user's strength) damage to foe if combat is happening above 1 range.

mantle.name: Mantle
mantle.desc: User can only be damaged by blessed weapons.

mercy.name: Mercy
mercy.desc: If user deals a death blow to foe, leave the enemy with 1 HP. If enemy is at 1 HP, they will dodge the attack. Can only be equipped by Elincia.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: (Luck)% chance to prevent an attack from killing the user. Instead the user's HP gets reduced to half of the current HP. If the current HP is 1 HP, the user will dodge.

nighttide.name: Night Tide
nighttide.desc: Increases adjacent allies defense and resistance by 5.

reference.Character:
Nolan
Black Knight
Calill
Ike (Vanguard)
Nasir

nullify.name: Nullify
nullify.desc: Negates foe's effective bonus towards the user.

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.desc: User gains double experience from combat.

parity.name: Parity
parity.desc: Command: Negates both user's and enemy's combat skills, terrain bonuses and support bonuses.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.desc: (Skill)% chance to ignore damage from one attack.

provoke.name: Provoke
provoke.desc: Makes user more likely to be attacked by the enemy.

quickclaw.name: Quickclaw
quickclaw.desc: (Speed)% chance to deal (user's strength) damage to foe if combat is happening above 1 range.

rend.name: Rend
rend.desc: (Speed/2)% chance to multiply user's strength by 5 and inflict shock on the foe.

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc:
At the beginning of each turn
user recovers HP equal to 1/10 of their max HP.

resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.desc:
When user is at half HP or lower, skill and speed are increased by 1.5.

**JP**: Strength is also increased, user needs to be at 20% HP or lower, and has (Strength)% chance to activate.

roar.name: Roar
roar.desc: (Strength/2)% chance to multiply user's strength by 3 and inflict shock on the foe.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.desc: Command: Reduces own HP to recover an ally's HP and cures the status effect. Cannot be used at 1 HP.

savage.name: Savage
savage.desc: (Strength/2)% chance to multiply user's strength by 3 and halve foe's skill by one turn.

savior.name: Savior
savior.desc: User's stats aren't decreased when carrying an unit.

shade.name: Shade
shade.desc: Makes user less likely to be attacked by the enemy.

shove.name: Shove
shove.desc: Push a ally 1 tile further if user's con + 2 > ally's weight.

shriek.name: Shriek
shriek.desc: (Luck)% chance to reduce foe's luck to 0 for one turn if combat is happening above 1 range.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Command: Pushes units two tiles away if user's con + 2 > ally's weight.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to multiply damage by 3 and restore HP based on damage dealt to the enemy.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Command: Steals an unequipped weapon/accessory or an item from the target's inventory if (user's speed > enemy's speed) and (user's strength > item's wt).

stillness.name: Stillness
stillness.desc: User is much less likely to be targeted by enemy units.

stun.name: Stun
stun.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to multiply user's strength by 3 and inflict paralysis on the foe.

tear.name: Tear
tear.desc: (Speed/2)% chance to mutiply user's strength by 3 for one turn and halve foe's speed for one turn.

reference.Class:
Raven
Raven King
Hawk
Hawk King

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: (Speed)% chance for the user to strike first if foe initiates combat.

whitepool.name: White Pool
whitepool.desc: Increases adjacent allies magic and speed by 5.

wildheart.name: Wildheart
wildheart.desc:
**Part 1:** User remains permanently shifted, but their transformation stat boosts are halved.
**Part 2 onward:** User can shift and revert at will, but their transformation bonuses are halved. The transformation gauge still decreases, but open untransforming it is filled fully.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc:
+50 crit when user is at 30% HP or lower.

**JP:** User needs to be at 20% HP or lower
and has (Skill)% chance to activate.
